entity.name: Countryfile
entity.description: Stories are shared of the people, places and issues at the heart of the British countryside. Popular features include the programme's photography contest, which culminates in a yearly calendar sold to benefit charity, the Video Diary, produced by viewers and focused on life in rural areas, and the weather forecasts.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Springwatch
entity.description: Following the fortunes of a cast of unforgettable wildlife characters at the climax of spring.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile Diaries
entity.description: A sister show to the BBC's `Countryfile' series, this rural affairs programme sees a team of presenters travel the length and breadth of the United Kingdom to cover stories related to the British countryside and the season of spring. As this period is a busy time of the year for the farming and outdoor communities in particular, regular topics covered include the production of food, nature conservation, and a look at a chosen area's culture and history. Stunning landscapes and a variety of wildlife also feature prominently.

urls.title: Precious chalk stream in Bexley gets health boost - Thames21
urls.description: Bexley residents and local wildlife can now enjoy a healthier river Cray where it flows through Foots Cray Meadows, Bexley.Waterways charity Thames21 has carried out restoration work on an 800m stretch of the river

tweets.text:
We're restoring an 800m stretch of the river Cray in #Bexley to help it flow more naturally & help plants, fish & birds to thrive, in partnership with @EnovertCT @LBofBexley & @EnvAgency üíß

tweets.text:
Fountains of sewage spurting from access chambers on Clifton Ings SSSI today. A regular occurrence when river levels are high, as has been pointed out many, many times to @EnvAgencyYNE, @NEYorksNLincs, @YorkshireWater. 
This is discharge pipe from Rawcliffe STW to River Ouse. https://t.co/2fWesgc9ow

@whiterosegreen @EnvAgencyYNE @NEYorksNLincs @YorkshireWater That is absolutely disgusting. Disgraceful that it can be allowed to happen repeatedly!

@YorkshireWater get your fingers out!
The time for ministers to intervene is long since passed. What is it going to take? https://t.co/hj4SdoqnUg

urls.title: Waste carriers, brokers and dealers
urls.description: beta This is a trial service ‚Äì your feedback will help us to improve it. Home Search waste carriers, brokers and dealers People or businesses who transport, buy, sell or dispose of waste, or arrange for someone els e to do so, must be registered. To check a registration, enter the registration number or business name: only carry waste they produced in the course of carrying out their business unless it is construction or demolition waste only carry (carrier), arrange (broker) or deal (dealer) in: animal
